title: Event Log
description: Logged action taken regarding the submission.

assocId.description: The submission or submission file ID.

assocType.description: The assoc object. This should always be `ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION` or `ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE`.

copyrightNotice.description: The context derived copyright notice confirmed for the submission

data.description: Additional data attached to this event log.

dateLogged.description: The date this event was recorded.

decision.description: The localized decision based on Decision::* constants.

editorId.description: The user ID of the editor associated with the event.

editorName.description: The full name of the editor associated with the event, e.g., who made a decision or recommendation.

eventType.description: The type of the event. One of the `SUBMISSION_LOG_` constants.

fileId.description: The ID of the file associated with the submission file

filename.description: The name of the file associated with the submission file

id.description: The id of the event log.

message.description: Custom log message, either a locale key or literal string.

recipientCount.description: The number of users indicated as recipients of an email.

recipientId.description: The user ID of the email recipient.

recipientName.description: The full name of the email recipient.

reviewAssignmentId.description: The ID of associated review assignment.

reviewDueDate.description: Date when the reviewer should accept or decline the assignment. Uses context's date and time format.

reviewerName.description: The full name of the reviewer associated with the event.

round.description: The number of the review round.

senderId.description: The user ID of the email sender.

senderName.description: The full name of the email sender.

stageId.description: The workflow stage ID associated submission was in when this event was logged. One of the `WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_` constants

sourceSubmissionFileId.description: The ID of the source file from which the current submission file was promoted to another stage

subject.description: The subject of the sent email.

submissionFileId.description: The ID of the submission file associates with the logged event.

submissionId.description: The ID of the submission associates with the logged event.

userFullName.description: The full name of the user/author associated with the event, e.g., confirming the copyright during submission.

userGroupName.description: The name of the role the user is in.

userId.description: The ID of the user who triggered the event

username.description: The username of the user/author associated with the event.
